Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Oh, yes please!$l#$b#I'm fond of coming with you in your little adventures.$h
Entries.companionRejected: I apologize, I don't think I can accompany you today.
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: I'm sorry love, I have a lot of things to do right now.$s
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: Aww, I can't today love.$s#$b#I'll make it up to you later tonight?$l
Entries.companionRejectedNight: It's quite late already.#$b#Maybe next time.
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: I'm kind of tired, love.$s#$b#Can I come with you next time?
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Not tonight, love.#$b#I'll just wait for you at home alright?$l#$b#I'll make things super comfortable for you when you get home.$l
Entries.companionDismiss: Oh, that was quite lovely.$h#$b#Thank you for letting me accompany you.$h
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: Aww, is it that time already?$s#$b#I wanted to spend more time with you.#$b#But I understand you have to do something else. Take care!$h
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: Tired of me already?$6#$b#Okay, I guess I'll be on my way then.#$b#I'm kidding! I'll see you back home.$h
Entries.companionDismissAuto: It's getting late, I should be heading home.#$b#Grandfather must be worried sick waiting for me.
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: It's quite late, love.#$b#Grandfather will kill you if you take me home late.
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Love, I think we need to get home already.#$b#I'm quite tired.#$b#You can go on ahead if you'd like, I'll just wait for you at home.
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: Where are you taking me, love?
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: You're bringing me somewhere we can be alone, are you?$h#$b#*giggles* You miss me that much, huh?$h
Entries.farmerRunAway: Hey, wait for me a bit!
Entries.farmerRunAway_Spouse: Why are you running so fast!$7#$b#Don't you want to walk together with me?$s
Entries.companion_Farm: This is nice.#$b#I can see you did a lot of work here.
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Is it easy tending to farms at your age, @?
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: I like the rain.$h#$b#It gets me wet, but I don't know...#$b#It's just feels, nice I guess.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: It's rather chilly out here.#$b#We should get a cup of hot cocoa later.
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: Are you going to plant strawberries this season?
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: I feel parched.#$b#Do you have something to drink with you?
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: The autumn leaves remind me of beautiful paintings in the opera houses I've been to.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: It's somewhat sad to think that crops die during winter.$6
Entries.companionEnter_Farm: Your farm looks impressive, @.$h#$b#You've got quite the gift for landscapes.
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night: Why are we here, @?#$b#Isn't it quite late?
Entries.companion_Farm_Night: Grandfather's going to be worried sick if I don't get home soon.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: I like what you did with your farm, love.$h#$b#It's quite homey.
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: Will you teach me how to tend the farm soon?$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: It's raining, love.#$b#Would you like me to take out an umbrella?
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: Love, can you warm up a fire for us?#$b#Or we could hug each other instead to keep ourselves warm.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Dating: Your farm is flourishing my love!$h#$b#I wish I had a green thumb like yours.
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Dating: It's quite hot, isn't it love?#$b#If you need water just tell me, alright?
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: The changing of the colors around your farm is so beautiful.$h#$b#I simply adore this season.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: Aww, the farm seems so barren during winter.$s#$b#But oh well, more time for you and me, love!$l
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Dating: Your farm looks astounding, my love!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Dating: Why are we here at this time of night, love?#$b#I'm feeling cold, hold me tight please.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Dating: I like how the wind blows your hair.$l#$b#It makes me want to cup your face and kiss you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: You're doing a great job with maintaining our farm, love.$h#$b#I can't wait till grandfather visits.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Do you think we should build a swing set?$6#$b#Or a porch swing for when we decide to have kids?$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: Hurray! Mother nature's shower will take care of your crops for today.$h#$b#More time for us, love.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Let's make snow angels around our home, love.$h#$b#I think that would look cute.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: Can we plant more strawberries this season?#$b#I heard they're healthy for the heart.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: Aww, you're sweating.#$b#You look hot under all that clothes.$l#$b#Maybe you'd like to lessen your layers.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: Let's take a pile of leaves and jump into it, love!$h#$b#We'll have to clean it up again, but at least it'll be fun!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: It's getting colder and colder every day.#$b#Can't we just stay at home and cuddle all season long?$l
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Spouse: I am astonished at the improvement that our farm has, thanks to your hard work.$h#$b#I'm so proud of you, my love.$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Spouse: We're home!$h#$b#Come to bed with me my love.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Spouse: Do you still have a lot to do?#$b#It's quite cold out here.#$b#Maybe we should cuddle after we work to regain lost energy, you know?$l#$b#Or maybe even lose some more... *she whispers*.$l
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: I'd love to dance in the rain one day.$h#$b#I wouldn't mind being sick after.
Entries.companion_Town: I just noticed... Pelican town's a bit smaller than Ridgeside Village, isn't it?#$b#It's funny how the latter is called a village because of that.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: We should visit Corine when we get the chance.#$b#I'd love to catch up with her!$h
Do you ever check out the bulletin board at the village plaza?#$b#Some people here post some bizarre requests.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge: I sometimes come here whenever I get all stressed or anxious with my thoughts.#$b#It gets awkward when someone sees me crying as I sit by the lake though.$6
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel: Want to hang out my room for a bit?$l#$b#Just some alone time, if you want, love.$l
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_EventHall: I'd love it if a galla was held here.$h#$b#Wouldn't that be fun?$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_EzekielHouse: Ah, I remember some of my childhood days whenever I visited the village.$h#$b#Corine and I would practice our makeup on one another! It was messy, but fun.#$b#I vaguely remember her Mom playing with us as well.$6#$b#I hope Uncle Ezekiel's alright.$s
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel: I always feel at ease whenever I dance by myself in here.#$b#It's like... I can express myself freely.$h#$b#I hope it's always like that.$s
Entries.companionSuggest: Hello, @! Is it okay for me to go with you today? I have some things to do and I would like some company, if that's okay.$h.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Love, can I come with you today? I miss spending time with you.$l.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: My love! Can I come with you? I'd like to take a stroll with my beautiful partner.$h.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Oh thank you! I promise I won't burden you with my presence.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No: Oh, alright.#$b#I'm sorry for the burden.
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Dating: Thank you, love!$h#$b#I swear, I'll be good.$l
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Spouse: Hmm, I guess you don't miss me then.#$b#Alright, I won't bother you anymore.
